definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: The amortization period shall not be less than one year.
sentences.chinese: 摊销期限不得少于一年。

sentences.english: Other intangible assets for which no amortized expense may be calculated for deduction.
sentences.chinese: 其他不得计算摊销费用扣除的无形资产。

sentences.english: For an amortizing transaction, the amount will be listed in an amortization schedule.
sentences.chinese: 为偿还交易，金额将列入一份摊销时间表。

sentences.english: Expenses incurred due to merger may be amortized within 10 years;
sentences.chinese: 五因合并产生之费用得于十年内摊销。

sentences.english: In evaluating the wisdom of business acquisitions, amortization charges should be ignored also.
sentences.chinese: 在评估商业并购是否明智时，摊销费用也应被忽略。

sentences.english: How many years shall I amortize them?
sentences.chinese: 好的，我该分几年来摊销？

sentences.english: You can live a full and rewarding life without ever thinking about Goodwill and its amortization.
sentences.chinese: 你根本不用想商誉和其摊销，也能生活得很充实有益。

sentences.english: The straight-line method normally is used for amortizing intangible assets.
sentences.chinese: 摊销无形资产通常用直线折旧法。

sentences.english: Expenditures incurred on major repair and improvement of the rented fixed assets shall be averagely amortized during the period of leasing.
sentences.chinese: 租入固定资产改良支出应当在租赁期内平均摊销。

sentences.english: All deferred assets shall be shown separately in accounting statements by its balance not yet amortized.
sentences.chinese: 各种递延资产的未摊销余额应当在会计报表中列示。

sentences.english: EBITDA should not be considered as a measure of our liquidity.
sentences.chinese: 折旧及摊销不应被视为衡量我们的流动资金。

sentences.english: The amortization of self-produced goodwill should be reevaluated year after year.
sentences.chinese: 对自创商誉的摊销可采用逐年重估法。

sentences.english: Prepaid land lease payments are amortised over the term of the lease by the straight-line method.
sentences.chinese: 预付土地租赁款项根租赁期限以直线法摊销。

sentences.english: American firms used to be allowed to amortise goodwill over many years.
sentences.chinese: 过去美国的企业被允许将商誉在很多年内逐步摊销。

sentences.english: An intangible asset shall be amortized for no less than 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 无形资产的摊销年限不得低于10年。

sentences.english: The goodwill generated due to merger may be amortized within 5 years;
sentences.chinese: 四因合并产生之商誉得于五年内摊销之。

definition: to set aside/to make provision for (capital requirements)
to claim a credit against/tax reduction
